details.group_dynamic_select: SELECT distinct(system.id) FROM system LEFT JOIN ip ON (ip.id = system.id AND ip.current = 'y') WHERE ((( ip.ip > '000.000.000.000' AND ip.ip < '010.000.000.000' ) OR ( ip.ip > '010.255.255.255' AND ip.ip < '169.254.0.0' ) OR ( ip.ip > '169.254.255.255' AND ip.ip < '172.016.000.000' ) OR ( ip.ip > '172.31.255.255' AND ip.ip < '192.168.000.000' ) OR ip.ip > '192.168.255.255' ) OR ( ( system.ip_address > '000.000.000.000' AND system.ip_address < '010.000.000.000' ) OR ( system.ip_address > '010.255.255.255' AND system.ip_address < '169.254.0.0' ) OR ( system.ip_address > '169.254.255.255' AND system.ip_address < '172.016.000.000' ) OR ( system.ip_address > '172.31.255.255' AND system.ip_address < '192.168.000.000' ) OR system.ip_address > '192.168.255.255' )) AND system.status = 'production'
details.group_description: Any items that have a public ip address and their status attribute set to production.
details.group_display_sql: SELECT system.id, system.hostname, system.description, system.ip_address, system.type, system.os_family, system.os_name, system.icon FROM system, oa_group_sys WHERE system.id = oa_group_sys.id AND oa_group_sys.group_id = ? GROUP BY system.id
